name: Kepithor
description: Kepithor Token (KEPI) is the native utility token of the Kepithor ecosystem, a UK-based Web3 gaming network. KEPI powers an interconnected suite of blockchain games—such as Kingdom Karnage and Royal Rampage—enabling in-game purchases, and prize rewards. It’s designed for long-term sustainability with no fixed emissions, and it redistributes value through platform revenue and gameplay, rather than inflationary minting.
